message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $9,000 is quite a bit below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate the compromise, but $11,500 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10,500, which is the maximum I can go. Can we meet at this price?
